Gerkenshtein`s Report:
The seek to seize the power of the gods. Legend speak of sacred relic of Einhasad being hidden from long ago in the territory of Goddard. I believe that evil creatures have appeared in order to seize that relic and to gain its power.
In other words, they are gathering items that contain the power of the gods, and delivering them to a puppet, who in turn delivers them to Shilen! Stopping them is the key to preventing devastation.
